footer.description: Transfer crypto easily through WhatsApp using our Web3 platform.

hero.legend: Transfer crypto easily through WhatsApp using our Web3 platform.

new.title: Send and receive crypto with WhatsApp

card-1.title: Send money to your contacts across the world instantly
card-1.description: Send money anywhere in the world, instantly with no banks and low fees. If your contacts have WhatsApp, they have ChatterPay.

card-2.title: Crypto and DeFi, at one message away
card-2.description: Buy, Sell and Hold crypto such as Bitcoin, Ethereum or Stablecoins with just one text or audio message.

card-3.title: Issue certificates with just a photo
card-3.description: Create photo certificates where you can certify the date of issuing, and cannot be deleted or modified.

card-4.title: The cheapest way to send money abroad
card-4.description: Create your account now for free, forever. No maintenance fees. Low fixed fee per transfer.

request-demo.title: Request a Demo
request-demo.description1: Contact our team for a product demonstration.
request-demo.description2: It's the wallet you need to enter the Web3 world.

faq1.question: What is ChatterPay?
faq1.answer: ChatterPay is a Wallet for WhatsApp that integrates AI and Account Abstraction to allow any user to easily and securely manage funds on the blockchain without technical knowledge.

faq2.question: How can I create a wallet?
faq2.answer: To create a wallet, you can do it directly from the ChatterPay Bot on WhatsApp.

faq3.question: What are the fees associated with receiving payments?
faq3.answer: ChatterPay charges a 0.01% fee for each received transfer.

faq4.question: Can I swap between different tokens?
faq4.answer: Yes, you can swap between USDT, DAI, MATIC, ETH, BTC, ADA, and DOT without transaction limits.

faq5.question: How can I check my balance and transactions?
faq5.answer: You can check your balance and transactions at any time through our dashboard at https://chatterpay.vercel.app/.

faq6.question: What happens if I lose my tokens?
faq6.answer: The system is decentralized, and the user is entirely responsible for managing their accounts. We do not offer insurance or support in case of losses due to user error.

faq7.question: Where can I get more information about how to use ChatterPay?
faq7.answer: You can visit our WebApp at https://chatterpay.vercel.app/ for more information and future guides.

faq8.question: Where is my wallet's private key stored?
faq8.answer: Your private key is stored securely using Account Abstraction technology on a layer 2 blockchain called Scroll with the 'KeyStore' technology, ensuring high security and user control.

faq9.question: What can I do on the website?
faq9.answer: You can view your wallet balance, check your transaction history, see your wallet address, and view your user information.

faq10.question: How do I log in to the website?
faq10.answer: Enter your registered phone number. A 6-digit code will be sent to your phone for security; once you enter it, you will be able to access the site.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.description: Welcome to ChatterPay, a Web3 wallet for WhatsApp. By using our application, you agree to comply with the following Terms and Conditions.

usage.title: 2. Use of ChatterPay
usage.description: ChatterPay allows you to send, receive, and manage digital assets within WhatsApp using blockchain technology. You agree that you are responsible for transactions made.

security.title: 3. Security
security.description: You agree to keep your account and private key confidential. ChatterPay is not liable for losses due to unauthorized access.

privacy_policy.title: 4. Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.description: We respect your privacy. For more information on how we handle your personal data, please refer to our

modifications.title: 5. Modifications
modifications.description: ChatterPay reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Updates will be posted on this page.

contact.title: 6. Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.description: At ChatterPay, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

data_collection.title: 2. Data Collection
data_collection.description: We collect personal information such as your name, email address, and transaction details on our platform.

data_usage.title: 3. Data Usage
data_usage.description: We use your information to enhance our services, ensure transaction security, and provide a personalized experience.

third_party.title: 4. Sharing with Third Parties
third_party.description: We do not share your data with third parties without your consent, except where required by law.

security.title: 5. Security
security.description: We implement advanced security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access and attacks.

modifications.title: 6. Modifications
modifications.description: We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, feel free to contact us at

msg.enter-phone: Enter phone number with area code, without 0 and without 15

msg.code-info: Please enter the 6-digit code we sent to your WhatsApp (it may take around 2 minutes to arrive).
